text:
nov 13
• wrote a starter kit for anyone to easily build your own leaderboard scrapers - ohcnetwork/leaderboard-scraper-template
• moved github scraper out from main leaderboard using the starter kit - ohcnetwork/leaderboard-github-scraper
• couple of minor improvements and fixes to get it merged #632
• discussions w. nikhila on various things
next
• workflow file generator, deploy leaderboard and other pending things...
